title: Tally is at work on new accounting platform for small businesses
description: Bengaluru-based Tally Solutions, a software solutions provider for small businesses, is planning a larger financial services play, intending to get into financial reconciliation, credit offerings, and an integrated tax filing service.
content: Software services provider for small businesses Tally Solutions is expanding its product suite, building an integrated accounting to financial reconciliation and credit facilitation offering.
cleaned_content: software services provider for small businesses tally solutions is expanding its product suite building an integrated accounting to financial reconciliation and credit facilitation offering
